## AcceptAny() function

Add custom header Accept that sets accepted type to any

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function AcceptAny(): (_target: RESTClient, _propertyKey: string, descriptor: RestHttpHeaders & RestMethodMiddlewares) => RestHttpHeaders & RestMethodMiddlewares;
```
